incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Infrastructure offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time: 29/08/2025 06:00 UTC End time: 29/08/2025 10:00 UTC Service impact: None Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an electrical maintenance on racks R808R16, R808R17 and R808R18. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our cooling infrastructure.
